name: My Plate
description: A social media site for foodies to share pics of their plates! Made possible by Node.js, Express.js, Multer, Sequelize, and Handlebars.js

name: SuperFan
description: A one stop shop for any fan to find tickets, merch, and info about all their favorites musicians. Created using the TicketMaster API, Rainforest API, Wikipedia API, as well as Bulma for styling.

name: Budget Tracker PWA
description: A PWA that allows you to keep track of your budget, even with poor or nonexistant internet. Made with Express.js, Node.js, Mongoose, and IndexDB

name: Social Network API
image: Social Network API displayed in Insomnia
description: An API for a hypothetical social network. Made with Express.js, Node.js, and Mongoose.

name: README generator
description: A command line interface application that creates custom readme files based on user input. Created with Node.js and Inquirer

name: E-commerce backend
description: A backend for a potential E-commerce site. Created with Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize, and MySQL

name: Destination Dance
description: An inventory management app for a local dance studio built with React.js, GraphQL, and Mongoose
